LanguageData.NocturnalAnimals.BodyClock_Description: Determines when the animal sleeps and when it is awake.\n\nDiurnal animals sleep during the night and are awake during the day, while nocturnal animals sleep during the day and are awake during the night. Crepuscular animals are mainly active during dusk.
LanguageData.VEF_WarningEggExplodes: Warning, this egg explodes when hatching!
LanguageData.VEF_TerrainsNeedsDiggable: The terrain needs to be diggable to do this
LanguageData.VCE_AffectsAllAnimalMods: These animal behaviours options will affect all animal mods that share code from the Vanilla Expanded Framework
LanguageData.VCE_CorpseDecayingEffectOption: Allow corpse decaying mechanics (for example, Helixien slug's effect)
LanguageData.VCE_DigWhenHungryOption: Allow digging when hungry mechanics (for example, Frostmites digging corpses)
LanguageData.VCE_DigPeriodicallyOption: Allows animals digging for things periodically
LanguageData.VFE_AsexualReproductionDisabled: Asexual reproduction disabled via mod options
LanguageData.VCE_BuildPeriodicallyOption: Allow animals building things (for example, beavers building dams)
LanguageData.VCE_ChargeBatteriesOption: Allow animals recharging nearby batteries or refueling
LanguageData.VCE_ExplodingEggsOption: Allow animals' eggs that explode (such as dragons')
LanguageData.VCE_HoveringOption: Allow animals "hovering", ignoring terrain movement costs
LanguageData.VCE_GraphicChangingOption: Allow animals changing graphics (for example, Chameleon Yak)
LanguageData.VCE_EffecterOption: Allows animals causing hediffs, mental states or thoughts
LanguageData.VCE_ResurrectionOption: Allow animals to auto-resurrect (for example Phoenix Owlcat)
LanguageData.VCE_UntameableOption: Allow some animals to be untameable
LanguageData.IP_OutputDesc: Processor will output {0}. It needs to be fed {1}
LanguageData.IP_CantFindThing: No items of that kind ({0}) found in this map
LanguageData.IP_BringIngredientsDesc: Bring ingredients to start the process
LanguageData.IP_CancelIngredientsDesc: Cancel Bringing Ingredients to this building
LanguageData.IP_IngredientImproperlyDefined: One of the ingredients has been improperly defined to work with the item processor, contact the mod's author
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysWarning: {0} needs to be powered to start working
LanguageData.IP_NoFuelDestroysWarning: {0} needs to be fueled to start working
LanguageData.IP_LightDestroysWarning: {0} needs to have an adequate light level to start working
LanguageData.IP_RainDestroysWarning: {0} needs to not be raining to start working
LanguageData.IP_TemperatureDestroysWarning: {0} needs to have an adequate temperature ({1} - {2}) to start working
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysInitialWarning: The result is spoiling due to a power failure in the item processor
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysMessage: The result has spoiled due to a power failure in the item processor
LanguageData.IP_GenericProductFinished: A product has finished processing and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.IP_ProcessingInProgress: {0} is processing {1}. {2} will be ready with {3} quality in {4}
LanguageData.IP_ProcessingInProgressNoQuality: {0} is processing {1}. {2} will be ready in {3}
LanguageData.IP_RemoveProductDesc: Remove {0} from the {1}. The product will be ready at the present quality level ({2})
LanguageData.IP_ResetSemiautomaticDesc: This will reset the building after the current product is finished, so a new input ingredient can be chosen
LanguageData.IP_NoCombination: No combination found for these ingredients
LanguageData.IP_SetAutoQuality: Set quality for product extraction. When the product reaches this quality, a colonist will automatically retrieve it and carry it to an stockpile if available. If not set, products will be extracted manually, or at Legendary quality.
LanguageData.IP_QualityAutoEstablished: Auto Quality, product will be extracted at quality level: {0}
LanguageData.IP_ToggleAutoDesc: If set to active, this building will automatically grab ingredients from adjacent hoppers, and automatically start working again once the product is removed. If not, colonists will haul the ingredients to the building, and it will need to be activated manually once refilled
LanguageData.IP_ResetFullAutoDesc: Fully resets the machine and makes it stop. Warning, it will destroy the process and the input items
LanguageData.IP_OutsideLightRange: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to an inadequate level of light and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToLight: The product in this machine has spoiled due to an inadequate level of light
LanguageData.IP_ItRains: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to inclement weather and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToRain: The product in this machine has spoiled due to inclement weather
LanguageData.IP_WrongTemp: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to an unsuitable temperature and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToWrongTemp: The product in this machine has spoiled due to an unsuitable temperature
LanguageData.IP_TempRangeInThisMachine: . This fermenter needs a temperature between {0} and {1} ÂºC
LanguageData.IP_OverThreshold: Waiting for output to clear. Output limit is {0}
LanguageData.IP_NoRecipesHere: No modded recipes found for this factory
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Protects_Desc: What body parts the shield protects.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.UsableWithShield: Whether or not this weapon can be used if the character also has a shield equipped.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.ModInfo: This faction is added by {ModName} and not currently present in your game.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.HiddenFactionInf: This is a hidden faction and won't show up in your faction list.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.RequiredFactionI: It is marked as required by {ModName}.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.NonSpawningFacti: This faction is marked as non-spawning and you should probably just ignore it.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.FactionButtonIgn: Don't ask for this faction again
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.FactionMessageFa: Failed to create a faction with settlements.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.FactionMinDistan: The minimum distance from player bases (recommended are {0}): {1}
LanguageData.VSE.ReinforcementsDesc: Seeing that your forces suffered losses, {FACTION_name} has decided to reinforce their raiding force
LanguageData.VWEL_ToggleHotshotDesc: Shots fired when standing still warm-up the weapon allowing for increased firing speed. Overheating can lead to detonation.
LanguageData.VFEMechForceRechargeDesc: Order the associated machine to return to this platform for charging, regardless of its current battery level.
LanguageData.VFEMechAttachTurretDesc: Construct a turret atop this mobile platform. This will require a colonist to deliver resources equal to that turret's normal construction cost.
LanguageData.VFEMechMachineDiedDesc: One of your machines has been destroyed! You can dismantle its remains at a machining table. In order to construct a replacement, one of your colonists will need to deliver the following parts to its platform:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.VFEMechLowerRangeDesc: Reduce the number of tiles this machine will travel.
LanguageData.VFEMechRaiseRangeDesc: Increase the number of tiles this machine will travel.
LanguageData.VFEMechStopMachineDesc: Stop this machine's progress and force it to return to base.
LanguageData.VFEMechMachineHitObstacle: Machine has run into an obstacle!
LanguageData.VFEMechSetAreaDesc: Set the allowed area for all of this platform's associated machines.
LanguageData.VFEMRideableMachineTip: This droid is rideable. People in a caravan will ride the fastest available animals/droids, improving the speed of the caravan as a whole.
LanguageData.VFEM.CaravanMachineRanOutPower: {MACHINE_nameDef} ran out of power, and was left behind.
LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.Title: Vanilla Expanded Framework - Outposts
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Create.Label: Create Outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Create.Desc: Create a new outpost using this caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.TakeItems.Label: Take items
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.TakeItems.Desc: Take items from {0} and add them to the caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Lost.Label: Outpost Lost
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Lost.Text: Regretfully, due to the deaths of all inhabitants, the outpost of {0} has been lost to us.
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.BattleWon.Label: Outpost Battle Won
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.BattleWon.Text: We have successfully won the battle for {0}.
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Items.Label: Items From {0}
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Items.Text: You have received the follow items from the outpost {0}:
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.AddPawn.Label: Add Pawn
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.AddPawn.Desc: Transfer a pawn from this caravan to the outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Pack.Label: Pack
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Pack.Desc: Begin packing this outpost back into a caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.StopPack.Label: Stop packing
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.StopPack.Desc: Cancel packing this outpost into a caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Remove.Label: Remove Pawn
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Remove.Desc: Remove a pawn from this outpost into a new caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Command.Remove.Only1: Cannot remove pawns: Only 1 inhabitant. If you want to remove this outpost, select "Pack".
LanguageData.Outposts.NotSkilledEnough: Pawns are not skilled enough, need a cumulative {0} skill of at least {1}
LanguageData.Outposts.NotEnoughPawns: Not enough pawns in caravan, need at least {0}
LanguageData.Outposts.TooClose: Too close to settlement or other outpost, must have at least 1 tile between them
LanguageData.Outposts.AddedFromTransportPods: Your transport pods have arrived. {0} has been added to {1}.
LanguageData.Outposts.SendNonPawns: Confirm sending items to the outpost? They will be permanently lost.
LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.DeliveryMethod.PackAni: Send pack animal carrying items to colony
LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.DeliveryMethod.PackOrP: Pods if available, otherwise pack animal
LanguageData.Outposts.Abandoned.Desc: {0} has been abonded due to having no one inside to run it. It will very quickly be looted and taken over by nature, leaving no trace it was ever there.
LanguageData.Outposts.AllowedBiomes: Must be in one of the following biomes:
LanguageData.Outposts.DisallowedBiomes: Cannot be in any of the following biomes:
LanguageData.Outposts.NumPawns: Must have at least {0} pawns willing to join the outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.RequiredSkill: Cumulative {0} skill must be at least {1}
LanguageData.Outposts.GrowingRequired: Must have ability to grow plants
LanguageData.Outposts.NoValidPawns: No valid pawns to add to outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.SkillChange: Due to changes in skill level, {0} can no longer produce {1}
LanguageData.PipeSystem_ConsumptionExplained: The amount per day of {0} this building will draw from the {1} grid.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_IdleConsumptionExplained: The amount of {0} this building will draw from the {1} grid when idle.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_ProductionExplained: The amount per day of {0} this building will produce for the {1} grid.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_DeconstructDesc: Only deconstruct pipes part of the {0} network.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_AugmentStackDesc: Augment output maximum stack size by 1.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_AugmentStackDescB: Augment output maximum stack size by 10.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_DecreaseStackDesc: Decrease output maximum stack size by 1.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_DecreaseStackDescB: Decrease output maximum stack size by 10.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_TransferContentDesc: Transfer storage content to other available storages.
LanguageData.PipeSystem_MarkedToTransferContent: Transfering content to other available storages...
LanguageData.NeedRestart: All settings need a restart to be applied
LanguageData.NeedToBeInGame: You first need to load a save
LanguageData.AskForPopUpExplained: Click this to be asked for each faction if you want it to be added to your game
LanguageData.CanAddXFaction: {0} faction(s) can be added to your current save
LanguageData.VEF.HireDesc: Hire some {0} to help around the colony, for example with defense.
LanguageData.VEF.ChooseNumberOfUnits: How many of that unit do you want to have?
LanguageData.VEF.HiringDesc: You can hire {0} for any period of time.You can only have one contract active at a time, and you cannot mix and match the factions from which you hire. If hired {0} die on duty, you will incur an additional 5% increase to contract price per dead pirate on all future contracts for a full year.
LanguageData.VEF.LongTerm: Long term contracts are significantly more expensive
LanguageData.VEF.NoRefund: Cancelling your contract will not refund the silver you spent on it.
LanguageData.VCE_AllowConditions: Allow chronic health conditions in food (Diabetes, Cholesterol and High Blood Pressure)
LanguageData.VCE_MustBeInstalled: Vanilla Cooking Expanded must be installed for these options to have any effect
LanguageData.VFE_ChooseMineDesc: Choose chunk type to drill. You can choose any of the map's rock types, or random
LanguageData.VFE_NeedsWater: This building must be placed on water
LanguageData.VFE_ChangeGraphicDesc: Change Graphic of this building randomly between those available
LanguageData.VFE_RandomOrSequentially: "Change Graphic" button changes graphic randomly (deselect for sequentially)
LanguageData.VFE.ColorSwitchPowerOff: Power is off. Impossible to switch color.
LanguageData.VME_MessageNeedsThePairedMeme: {0} needs one of the following memes to be chosen too to work: {1}
